definition: Properties of a stimulus Isolator device.

description.definition: A description of this hardware item.

gain_db.definition: The gain of the device given in db.

gain_step_size.definition: The size of the gain steps between minimum and maximum.

inventory_no.definition: The inventory number of the device.

manufacturer.definition: The Manufacturer of this hardware item.

maximum_gain.definition: The maximum gain of the device.

minimum_gain.definition: The minimum gain of the device.

model.definition: The model name of this hardware item.

name: hardware_stimulus_isolator

outpu_mode.definition: The polarity mode of the stimulus isolator.

output_type.definition: The type of output of the stimulus isolator.

owner.definition: Who's the owner of the device.
